an4.140:1.3: Atthi, bhikkhave, vadi atthato pariyadanam gacchati, no byanjanato;
an4.140:1.4: atthi, bhikkhave, vadi byanjanato pariyadanam gacchati, no atthato;
an4.140:1.5: atthi, bhikkhave, vadi atthato ca byanjanato ca pariyadanam gacchati;
an4.140:1.6: atthi, bhikkhave, vadi nevatthato no byanjanato pariyadanam gacchati.
an4.140:1.8: Atthanametam, bhikkhave, anavakaso yam catuhi patisambhidahi samannagato atthato va byanjanato va pariyadanam gaccheyya”ti.
